Key.Info: Для Альфа без привязки к пользователю

Param.Name: From
Param.Caption: C
Param.Default: Select Sysdate As ID from dual

Param.Name: To
Param.Caption: По
Param.Default: Select Sysdate As ID from dual

Params.Param: Select '-1' ID, 'Все модели' As TXT From dual union Select '1', 'Ford Galaxy' From dual union Select '2', 'Ford Fusion' From dual union Select '3', 'Dewo Matiz' From dual union Select '4', 'Иж Ода' From dual

Param.Name: Month
Param.Caption: Месяц
Param.Typ: Select '= To_Char(D,''''DD.MM.YYYY'''')' As ID from dual

Params.Param: Select '01.01.2019' AS ID, 'Январь' AS TXT from dual union Select '01.02.2019' AS ID, 'Февраль' AS TXT from dual union Select '01.03.2019' AS ID, 'Март' AS TXT from dual

Workflows.Workflow: Select 'Select D.sbs_no as fldSBS, D.sid As fldDocSID, D.doc_no As fldDocNumber, D.post_date as fldDocDate, D.bt_cuid as fldCustomerSID, case when LPAD(D.store_no,3,''0'')=''001'' then ''003'' end as fldStore, case when D.has_sale=1 then 1 else 0 end as fldDocType, #case when coalesce(i.PROC_STATUS,0)=0 then 0 when i.PROC_STATUS=131072 then 3 when i.PROC_STATUS=65536 then 2 else -1 end as fldDocStatus, coalesce((Select round(sum(amount),2) As fldTotalCash From rpsods.tender TCash Where D.sid=TCash.doc_sid and TCash.tender_type=0),0) as fldTotalCash, coalesce((Select round(sum(amount),2) As fldTotalCard From rpsods.tender TCash Where D.sid=TCash.doc_sid and TCash.tender_type=2),0) as fldTotalCard, coalesce((Select round(sum(amount),2) As fldTotalOther From rpsods.tender TCash Where D.sid=TCash.doc_sid and TCash.tender_type not in (0,2,5)),0) as fldTotalOther, coalesce((Select round(sum(amount),2) As fldBonus From rpsods.tender TCash Where D.sid=TCash.doc_sid and TCash.tender_type =5),0) as fldBonus, I.item_pos As fldSeqNum, (Select GROUP_CONCAT(card_type_name) From (Select ''Наличные'' As card_type_name From rpsods.tender TCash Where D.sid=TCash.doc_sid and TCash.tender_type=0 union Select ''Бонусы'' As card_type_name From rpsods.tender TCash Where D.sid=TCash.doc_sid and TCash.tender_type=5 union Select distinct TCred.card_type_name From rpsods.tender T left join rpsods.tender_credit_card TCred On T.sid = TCred.tender_sid Where D.sid=T.doc_sid and T.tender_type=2 ) A223) As fldCard_type, I.sid as fldItemSID, I.scan_upc as fldUPC, Round(I.qty,0) as fldDocItmQty, Round(I.price,2) as fldDocItmPrice, Round(I.tax_perc,0) as fldVATprc, Round(I.cost,2) as fldDocItmCost, D.cashier_full_name as fldCashier, D.bt_last_name as fldClient, D.bt_first_name as fldClient_name, D.bt_primary_phone_no as fldphone, D.reason_code as fldReason, #D.reason_description I.so_number as fldPO_NUM, '''' as fldDelvry From rpsods.document D inner join rpsods.document_item I On D.sid= I.doc_sid Where D.post_date >= Date_Add(sysdate(), interval -7 day) and D.doc_no > 0 and (D.has_sale=1 or D.has_return=1)' As QUERY, 'D:\\Vremena\\invoices.dat' As FILE_PATH, 'True' As "APPEND", '\\t' As COL_SPAN, '\\r\\n' As ROW_SPAN

select 'select case when s.store_no=1 then ''5010'' end as fldSBS, c0.sid as fldclientSID, c0.cust_id as fld_cust_id, case when c0.last_name is null then null else c0.last_name end as fldClient, case when c0.first_name is null then null else c0.first_name end as fldClient_name, c3.phone_no as fldphone from customer c0 inner join store s On c0.store_sid = s.sid inner join customer_address ca on c0.SID = ca.CUST_SID inner join customer_phone c3 on c3.cust_sid = ca.cust_sid where c3.phone_no like ''%+7%'' and c0.post_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT(Date_Add(sysdate(), interval -7 day), ''%Y-%m-01'') order by fldSBS, fldclientSID, fld_cust_id, fldClient, fldClient_name, fldphone' As QUERY, 'D:\\Vremena\\clients.dat' As FILE_PATH, 'True' As "APPEND",'\\t' As COL_SPAN, '\\r\\n' As ROW_SPAN

select 'select v.vend_code as "fldVendorCode", v.vend_name as "fldCompany", va.postal_code as "fldZip", va.address_1 as "fldAddr1", va.address_2 as "fldAddr2", va.address_3 as "fldAddr3", vc.phone1_no as "fldPhone1", vc.phone2_no as "fldPhone2", vc.first_name as "fldFName", vc.last_name as "fldLName" from VENDOR v inner join vendor_contact_address va on v.sid=va.vend_sid left join vendor_contact vc on v.sid = vc.sid' As QUERY, 'D:\\Vremena\\vendors.dat'As FILE_PATH, 'True' As "APPEND", '\\t' As COL_SPAN, '\\r\\n' As ROW_SPAN

select 'With T As (Select case when i.sbs_sid =5025 then 5010 else i.sbs_sid end as fldSBS, i.sid As fldItemSID, d.dcs_code as fldDCScode, d.c_long_name as fldCname, d.s_long_name as fldSname, i.DESCRIPTION1 as fldDesc1, i.DESCRIPTION2 as fldDesc2, i.DESCRIPTION3 as fldDesc3, i.text5 as fldDesc4, i.attribute as fldAttr, i.text4 as Contry, i.text3 as fld1SshortName, i.TEXT5 as fld1LlongName, i.text6 as fldcomposition, v.vend_code as fldVendorCode, i.cost as fldcost, i.upc as fldUPC, i.ALU as fldALU, i.item_size as fldSize, i.attribute as fldColor, Round(tr.tax_perc1,0) As fldVATprc, e.udf9_string udf38 From rpsods.invn_sbs_item i inner join rpsods.dcs d On i.dcs_sid=d.sid left join rpsods.vendor v On i.vend_sid=v.sid left join rpsods.tax_code tc On i.tax_code_sid=tc.sid left join rpsods.tax t on tc.sid=t.tax_code_sid left join rpsods.tax_code_rule tr on t.tax_code_rule_sid=tr.sid left join rpsods.invn_sbs_extend e on i.sid=e.invn_sbs_item_sid Where i.post_date >= DATE_FORMAT(Date_Add(sysdate(), interval -20 day), ''%Y-%m-01'') ) Select distinct fldSBS, fldItemSID, fld1SshortName, udf38 as fldSeason, fldDesc1 as fld1Sarticul, fldsize, fldcolor, fldcomposition, fld1LlongName||''''/''''||fldDesc2 as fld1SlongName, ''шт'' as fldMeasure, fldVATprc, '''' as fldGTD, Contry as fldCountry, fldcost, fldUPC From T' As QUERY, 'D:\\Vremena\\items.dat' As FILE_PATH, 'True' As "APPEND",'\\t' As COL_SPAN, '\\r\\n' As ROW_SPAN from dual

select 'With T As (Select case when v.sbs_sid =5025 then 5010 end as fldSBS, v.sid as fldDocSID, v.vou_no as fldDocNumber, v.modified_datetime as fldDocDate, ve.vend_code as fldVendorCode, ve.info2 as fldINN, LPAD(s.store_no,3,''0'') as fldStore, v.vou_type as fldDocType, ifnull(v.proc_status,0) as fldDocStatus, i.item_pos as fldSeqNum, i.sid as fldItemSID, round(i.qty,0) as fldDocItmQty, round(i.cost,0) as fldDocItmCost, Round(tr.tax_perc1,0) as fldVATprc, v.vou_reason_sid as fldReason From rpsods.voucher v inner join rpsods.vendor ve on v.vend_sid = ve.sid inner join rpsods.store s on v.store_sid=s.sid inner join rpsods.vou_item i on v.sid=i.vou_sid left join rpsods.tax_code tc On i.tax_code_sid=tc.sid left join rpsods.tax t on tc.sid=t.tax_code_sid left join rpsods.tax_code_rule tr on t.tax_code_rule_sid=tr.sid #Where v.sid=1637742503548 ) Select fldSBS, fldDocSID, fldDocNumber, fldDocDate, fldVendorCode, fldINN, case when fldStore=''001'' then ''003'' else fldStore end as fldStore, fldDocType, case when coalesce(fldDocStatus,0)=0 then 0 else fldDocStatus/16+1 end as fldDocStatus, fldSeqNum, fldItemSID, fldDocItmQty, fldDocItmCost, fldVATprc, fldReason From T' As QUERY, 'D:\\Vremena\\vouchers.dat'As FILE_PATH, 'True' As "APPEND",'\\t' As COL_SPAN, '\\r\\n' As ROW_SPAN

Select ' Select case when v.sbs_sid=5025 then 5010 end as fldSBS, i.sid as fldDocSID, v.vou_no as fldDocNumber, v.post_date as fldDocDate, case when v.sbs_sid= 5025 then ''003'' else v.sbs_sid end as fldStoreFrom, case when ve.vend_code=''15772'' then ''003'' when ve.vend_code=''18741'' then ''002'' when ve.VEND_CODE=''518742'' then ''006'' when ve.vend_code=''515774'' then ''005'' when ve.vend_code=''15776'' then ''004'' when ve.VEND_CODE=''15773'' then ''001'' else null end as fldStoreTo, v.vou_type as fldDocType, v.vou_class as fldDocStatus, i.item_pos as fldSeqNum, i.sid as fldItemSID, round(i.qty,0) as fldDocItmQty, round(i.cost,2) as fldDocItmCost, round(i.price,2) as fldDocItmPrice, Round(tr.tax_perc1,0) as fldVATprc From rpsods.voucher v inner join rpsods.vendor ve on v.vend_sid = ve.sid inner join rpsods.vou_item i on v.sid=i.vou_sid left join rpsods.tax_code tc On i.tax_code_sid=tc.sid left join rpsods.tax t on tc.sid=t.tax_code_sid left join rpsods.tax_code_rule tr on t.tax_code_rule_sid=tr.sid Where v.vou_type=1 and v.vou_no >0 and ve.vend_code in (''15772'',''15773'',''18741'',''15776'',''515774'',''515774'',''518742'') and v.post_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT(Date_Add(sysdate(), interval -7 day), ''%Y-%m-01'') and v.proc_status is null order by v.POST_DATE ' As QUERY, 'D:\\Vremena\\slip1.dat'As FILE_PATH, 'True' As "APPEND", '\\t' As COL_SPAN, '\\r\\n' As ROW_SPAN

Select ' Select case when i.sbs_sid = 5025 then 5010 else i.sbs_sid end as fldsbs, i.sid as fldItemSID, i.upc as fldUPC, round(Sum(Case When l.price_lvl=1 Then PRICE Else 0 End),2) As fldLvl1, round(Sum(Case When l.price_lvl=2 Then PRICE Else 0 End),2) As fldLvl2 From rpsods.invn_sbs_item i inner join rpsods.invn_sbs_price p on i.sid=p.invn_sbs_item_sid inner join rpsods.price_level l on p.price_lvl_sid=l.sid where i.modified_datetime >= DATE_FORMAT(Date_Add(sysdate(), interval -7 day), ''%Y-%m-01'') Group By i.sbs_sid, i.sid, i.upc ' As QUERY, 'D:\\Vremena\\price.dat' As FILE_PATH, 'True' As "APPEND", '\\t' As COL_SPAN, '\\r\\n' As ROW_SPAN
